original_text: After Jesus and his disciples arrived in Capernaum, the collectors of the two-drachma temple tax came to Peter and asked, “Doesn’t your teacher pay the temple tax?”
korean_text: 가버나움에 이르니 반 세겔 받는 자들이 베드로에게 나아와 이르되 너의 선생은 반 세겔을 내지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: After Jesus and his disciples arrived in Capernaum
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님과 그의 제자들이 가버나움에 도착한 후에

sentences.original_text: the collectors of the two-drachma temple tax
Doesn't your teacher pay the temple tax?
